original:
<DIALOG2>Let's see...<NEXT>The ruins are on
the other end of
the tunnel,<NEXT>and the underground
entrance is at
the far end of<NEXT>the branch in
the road.[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Wonder if there

of this passage!<NEXT>Be careful!<NEXT>[0xbb][0x0][0xdc][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>There's not much

for the ruins...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>If you ask me, it
looks like the water
level's rising...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>An underground
entrance appearing<NEXT>in the middle of

a story like that
in a book once...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>The current's
getting stronger
and stronger...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Hmmmm...<NEXT>Expeditions
underground long
ago found large<NEXT>cave-like open
areas, but still...<NEXT>I think it would
take a lot more
than an earthquake<NEXT>to make a Sub-Gate
appear like that...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I'm not going home
